replies.author: Iridium_Ore
replies.txt_content: 如果有Essentials插件系统的话 /tell 名字 内容 回复/r 内容

replies.author: sweetapple
replies.txt_content: 唔。。。回楼上。我更倾向于用  “/m 玩家id 聊天内容”这样来私聊
